title: I Want to Stare!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Shizuku-san, thank you for inviting me to the play.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Likewise, thank you for coming to watch. Um...... What did you think about my performance?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>How... How should I say this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Do you think I played the role of a graceful, beautiful lady well?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Umm......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Huh!? I didn’t!? Ugh~! I couldn’t incorporate your persona into my acting, even though I asked if I could observe you and take a video of you~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>N-No, that’s not the case! I-I was just so immersed in the story... I was absolutely captivated by how you captured your character’s spirit on stage, so I didn’t really pay attention to your movements......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Huh... Really!? Well, I also tried to incorporate the nobility of a refined young lady like you, Dia-san. Ehehe, looks like I did it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s not true. I’m still growing and learning.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>No way! If I didn’t have you as a reference, I wouldn’t have been able to play that character as well!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Th-Thank you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Dia-san, you’re an amazing woman. May I observe you for just a bit more... please!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Huh!? L-Let me think about it for a minute~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
